panels.description: Time that the InfluxDB process has been running.

targets.expr: influxdb_uptime_seconds{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}

panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Number of buckets on the server.

targets.expr: sum by(job, influxdb_cluster) (influxdb_buckets_total{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Buckets

panels.description: Total number of users for the server.

targets.expr: sum by(job, influxdb_cluster) (influxdb_users_total{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Users

panels.description: Number of replication configurations on the server.

targets.expr: sum by(job, influxdb_cluster) (influxdb_replications_total{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Replications

panels.description: Number of remote connections configured on the server.

targets.expr: sum by(job, influxdb_cluster) (influxdb_remotes_total{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Remotes

panels.description: Number of scrapers on the server.

targets.expr: sum by(job, influxdb_cluster) (influxdb_scrapers_total{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Scrapers

panels.description: Number of dashboards on the server.

targets.expr: sum by(job, influxdb_cluster) (influxdb_dashboards_total{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Dashboards

panels.description: Number of threads currently active on the server.

targets.expr: sum by(job, influxdb_cluster) (go_threads{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Threads

panels.description: Rate of HTTP requests to the API, organized by response code.

targets.expr: sum by(job, influxdb_cluster, instance, status) (rate(http_api_requests_total{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: HTTP API requests

panels.description: Number of active queries for the server.

targets.expr: sum by(job, influxdb_cluster, instance) (qc_compiling_active{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"})
sum by(job, influxdb_cluster, instance) (qc_queueing_active{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"})
sum by(job, influxdb_cluster, instance) (qc_executing_active{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"})

panels.title: Active queries

panels.description: Rate of database operations from HTTP for the server.

targets.expr: sum by(job, influxdb_cluster, instance, status) (rate(http_query_request_count{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum by(job, influxdb_cluster, instance, status) (rate(http_write_request_count{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

panels.title: HTTP operations

panels.description: Rate of database HTTP operation data for the server.

targets.expr: sum by(job, influxdb_cluster, instance) (rate(http_query_request_bytes{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(job, influxdb_cluster, instance) (rate(http_query_response_bytes{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(job, influxdb_cluster, instance) (rate(http_write_request_bytes{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(job, influxdb_cluster, instance) (rate(http_write_response_bytes{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: HTTP operation data

panels.description: Rate of InfluxQL queries for the server.

targets.expr: sum by(job, influxdb_cluster, instance, result) (rate(influxql_service_requests_total{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: IQL query rate

panels.description: Response time for recent InfluxQL queries, organized by result.

targets.expr: sum by(job, influxdb_cluster, instance, result) (increase(influxql_service_executing_duration_seconds_sum{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval:]))

panels.title: IQL query response time / $__interval

panels.description: Rate of reads and writes to the underlying BoltDB storage engine for the server.

targets.expr: rate(boltdb_reads_total{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
rate(boltdb_writes_total{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: BoltDB operations

panels.description: Number of tasks currently being executed for the server.

targets.expr: task_scheduler_current_execution{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}

panels.title: Active tasks

panels.description: Number of workers currently running tasks on the server.

targets.expr: task_executor_total_runs_active{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}

panels.title: Active workers

panels.description: Percentage of available workers that are currently busy.

targets.expr: task_executor_workers_busy{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}

panels.title: Worker usage

panels.description: Rate of executions and execution failures for the server.

targets.expr: rate(task_scheduler_total_execution_calls{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
rate(task_scheduler_total_execute_failure{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Executions

panels.description: Rate of schedule operations and schedule operation failures for the server.

targets.expr: rate(task_scheduler_total_schedule_calls{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])
rate(task_scheduler_total_schedule_fails{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])

panels.title: Schedules

panels.description: Amount of time since the last garbage collection cycle.

targets.expr: time() - go_memstats_last_gc_time_seconds{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}

panels.title: Time since last GC

panels.description: Server CPU time spent on garbage collection.

targets.expr: increase(go_gc_duration_seconds_sum{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}[$__interval:])

panels.title: GC time / $__interval

panels.description: Percent of server CPU time used for garbage collection.

targets.expr: go_memstats_gc_cpu_fraction{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}

panels.title: GC CPU usage

panels.description: Heap memory usage for the server.

targets.expr: go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}/clamp_min((go_memstats_heap_idle_bytes{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"} + go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}), 1)

panels.title: Heap memory usage

panels.description: Number of OS threads created for the server.

targets.expr: go_threads{job=~"$job", influxdb_cluster=~"$influxdb_cluster", instance=~"$instance", instance=~"$instance"}

panels.title: Go threads
